Desc.entry: Hosts playgroups, badminton, tae-bo, tae-kwondo, folk dancing, street dance for juniors, line dancing, cabaret showdance, burlesque/show dancing, over 50s activity hour, aerobics, step and pilates. Also hosts an exercise group for people with osteoporosis, arthritic or rheumatoid affected joints and a house church. Has rooms available for hire for weddings and functions (see separate entry).

ProvisionPlace.entry: Access road between houses 318 & 324 on Burncross Road

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 35
